section.p: Information regarding the disposition of the patient

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11408 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.4"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10652)/@code="67661-9" EMS Disposition Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10651)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Disposition Section" which SHOULD equal "EMS Disposition" (CONF:10654)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10653)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:11003)
